tasks.description: Create a simple character using only basic shapes (circles, squares, rectangles)
Implement at least 3 different colors with a cohesive palette
Add simple shadows using shapes (not gradients yet)
Practice pen tool for at least one custom shape (like a bowtie or hat)
Design 4 related icons (e.g., weather, food, or tech themes)
Use the pen tool to create custom shapes
Implement a consistent color scheme across all icons
Practice alignment and spacing for visual harmony
Create a stylized landscape with foreground, middle ground, and background
Use the pen tool to create organic shapes (hills, clouds, trees)
Implement a limited color palette (5-7 colors)
Add simple texture using shape repetition
Illustrate a meal or food item with multiple components
Practice curved lines and organic shapes
Experiment with opacity and layering
Add highlights and shadows to create dimension
Create a more detailed natural subject
Implement gradients for the first time
Use the pen tool for more complex curved shapes
Practice creating depth through overlapping elements
